testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application has actual functionality beyond basic placeholder
steps: Verify landing page loads with construction materials theme
Check for multiple interactive elements (navigation, search, login button)
Confirm application has real features, not just 'Vite + React' placeholder text
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application shows functional construction marketplace features with proper branding and navigation
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows 'Vite + React' placeholder, this test should FAIL

testCases.name: Landing Page Content
testCases.description: Test landing page displays correctly with construction materials marketplace content
steps: Verify page title contains '123Construction Shop Finder' or similar
Check for hero section with construction/materials imagery
Check for feature highlights (BOM builder, price comparison, etc.)
Verify footer with links to About, Terms, Privacy
testCases.expectedOutcome: Landing page shows professional construction marketplace interface with clear value proposition

testCases.name: User Registration Flow
testCases.description: Test complete user registration process for buyers and sellers
steps: Fill in name: Test Buyer User
Verify redirect to dashboard or login page
Check for welcome notification or message
testCases.expectedOutcome: New user account created successfully, redirected to appropriate page with confirmation

testCases.name: Buyer Login
testCases.description: Test buyer user login with valid credentials
steps: Check for user menu with name 'John Smith'
Verify buyer-specific features visible (BOM builder, RFQ, etc.)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Buyer logs in successfully, sees buyer dashboard with appropriate features

testCases.name: Seller Login
testCases.description: Test seller user login and shop dashboard access
steps: Check for seller-specific navigation (Shop Dashboard, Inventory, Analytics)
Verify shop dashboard loads with shop name 'Dubai Building Materials Co.'
testCases.expectedOutcome: Seller logs in successfully, sees shop management features and dashboard

testCases.name: User Logout
testCases.description: Test user logout functionality
steps: Verify redirect to landing page or login page
testCases.expectedOutcome: User logs out successfully, cannot access protected routes without re-authentication

testCases.name: Basic Product Search
testCases.description: Test basic product search functionality
steps: Navigate to search page or use global search bar
Check for product listings with 'cement' in name or description
Verify results show product images, names, prices
Check for filters (category, price range, location)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search returns relevant cement products with pricing and shop information

testCases.name: Search with Filters
testCases.description: Test product search with category and price filters
steps: Verify filtered results show only steel products in price range
Clear filters and verify all results return
testCases.expectedOutcome: Filters correctly narrow down search results to matching criteria

testCases.name: Product Details View
testCases.description: Test product details page with variants and pricing
steps: Check product information displayed (name, description, specifications)
Verify shop location and distance information
testCases.expectedOutcome: Product details page shows comprehensive product information with variants and multi-shop pricing

testCases.name: Price Comparison
testCases.description: Test multi-shop price comparison feature
steps: Verify comparison table shows selected products
Check price comparison across different shops
Check stock availability for each shop
Test 'Add to BOM' from comparison view
testCases.expectedOutcome: Price comparison table clearly shows pricing differences across shops with relevant details

testCases.name: Create New BOM
testCases.description: Test creating a new Bill of Materials
prerequisites: User must be logged in as buyer
steps: Check BOM appears in BOM library
testCases.expectedOutcome: New BOM created and saved successfully, appears in user's BOM library

testCases.name: Add Items to BOM
testCases.description: Test adding products to BOM
prerequisites: User must be logged in as buyer
steps: Open existing BOM or create new one
Verify item appears in BOM list
Verify total item count shows 2 items
testCases.expectedOutcome: Items successfully added to BOM with correct quantity and cost calculations

testCases.name: BOM Cost Analysis
testCases.description: Test BOM cost analysis and optimization suggestions
steps: View optimization suggestions (cheapest shop per item)
Verify delivery cost calculations if applicable
Test toggle between single-shop vs multi-shop options
testCases.expectedOutcome: Cost analysis shows detailed breakdown with optimization recommendations

testCases.name: Create RFQ from BOM
testCases.description: Test creating Request for Quote from BOM
prerequisites: User must be logged in as buyer
steps: Enter RFQ title: 'Test RFQ for Materials'
Select shops to invite (or auto-invite based on location)
Check RFQ appears in RFQ inbox
testCases.expectedOutcome: RFQ created successfully and sent to selected shops

testCases.name: Seller Respond to RFQ
testCases.description: Test seller responding to RFQ invitation
steps: Enter pricing for each line item
Check quote appears in buyer's RFQ replies
testCases.expectedOutcome: Seller successfully submits quote which buyer can view

testCases.name: RFQ Messaging
testCases.description: Test messaging between buyer and seller within RFQ
prerequisites: RFQ must exist with at least one quote
steps: Send message to seller: 'Can you improve delivery time?'
testCases.expectedOutcome: Messages sent and received successfully between buyer and seller

testCases.name: Shop Dashboard View
testCases.description: Test shop dashboard for sellers
prerequisites: Must login as seller with shop
steps: Verify shop name and details displayed
Check for key metrics (active products, pending RFQs, recent orders)
Verify quick action buttons (Add Product, Update Inventory)
Verify recent activity feed or timeline
testCases.expectedOutcome: Shop dashboard shows relevant business metrics and quick actions for seller

testCases.name: Inventory Management
testCases.description: Test inventory management features for sellers
prerequisites: Must login as seller with shop
steps: View list of products in inventory
Update stock quantity for a product
Toggle stock availability (in stock / out of stock)
Update lead time for a product
testCases.expectedOutcome: Seller can successfully update inventory levels and availability

testCases.name: Product Pricing Management
testCases.description: Test price management features for sellers
prerequisites: Must login as seller with shop
steps: Navigate to shop inventory or pricing section
Select a product to update price
Add bulk pricing tiers (e.g., 100+ units, 500+ units)
Set promotional price with start/end dates
Verify updated price shows in product search
testCases.expectedOutcome: Seller can update pricing including bulk tiers and promotions

testCases.name: Map View with Shop Locations
testCases.description: Test interactive map showing shop locations
steps: Verify map loads with shop markers
Check user location marker (if permission granted)
Verify shop info popup displays (name, address, rating)
Test filtering shops by category or type
testCases.expectedOutcome: Interactive map displays shops with accurate locations and filtering options

testCases.name: Price Drop Alert
testCases.description: Test setting up price drop alerts
prerequisites: User must be logged in as buyer
steps: Verify alert appears in alerts list
testCases.expectedOutcome: Price alert successfully created and manageable

testCases.name: Stock Availability Alert
testCases.description: Test stock availability notification alerts
steps: Find product that is out of stock
Verify alert created in alerts management
Check alert shows product and shop information
testCases.expectedOutcome: Stock alert successfully set up for out-of-stock products

testCases.name: User Profile View
testCases.description: Test viewing user profile information
steps: Verify user information displayed (name, email, phone)
Check for profile completion percentage or indicators
testCases.expectedOutcome: User profile shows all relevant account information

testCases.name: Edit User Profile
testCases.description: Test editing user profile information
steps: Refresh page and verify changes persisted
testCases.expectedOutcome: User can successfully update profile information

testCases.name: Browse Product Categories
testCases.description: Test category browsing and navigation
steps: Verify top-level categories displayed (Building Materials, Tools, Hardware)
Verify subcategories shown (Cement & Concrete, Steel & Rebar)
Test breadcrumb navigation back to parent category
testCases.expectedOutcome: Category hierarchy navigable with proper product filtering

testCases.name: View Notifications
testCases.description: Test notification center functionality
steps: Click on notification icon in top navigation
Check for notifications (price alerts, RFQ updates, etc.)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Notification center displays and manages notifications correctly

testCases.name: Mobile Responsiveness
testCases.description: Test mobile layout and navigation
steps: Check hamburger menu or mobile navigation
Navigate through key pages (search, BOM, profile)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application is fully functional and well-designed on mobile devices

testCases.name: Tablet Responsiveness
testCases.description: Test tablet layout and functionality
steps: Test data tables and comparison views
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application layout works well on tablet devices

testCases.name: Page Load Performance
testCases.description: Test page load times and performance
steps: Measure time to interactive (should be < 3 seconds)
Check for lazy loading of images
Navigate to search results with many products
Verify pagination or infinite scroll performance
Check for smooth scrolling and interactions
testCases.expectedOutcome: Pages load quickly with smooth interactions

testCases.name: Authentication Security
testCases.description: Test authentication security measures
steps: Attempt to access protected route without login
Test SQL injection in login form
testCases.expectedOutcome: Authentication properly protects routes and handles security threats
testCases.failureCondition: Any security vulnerability allows unauthorized access

testCases.name: Role-Based Authorization
testCases.description: Test role-based access controls
steps: Attempt to edit another user's BOM
testCases.expectedOutcome: Users can only access features appropriate to their role
testCases.failureCondition: Any user can access unauthorized features

testCases.name: 404 Error Handling
testCases.description: Test 404 page and invalid route handling
steps: Verify 404 page or redirect to homepage
Test navigation back to valid pages
testCases.expectedOutcome: Invalid routes handled gracefully with helpful error messages

testCases.name: API Error Handling
testCases.description: Test handling of API errors
steps: Trigger API error (disconnect network or use invalid data)
Verify error message displayed to user
testCases.expectedOutcome: API errors handled gracefully with user-friendly messages

testCases.name: End-to-End Buyer Journey
testCases.description: Complete buyer user journey from registration to RFQ submission
steps: Set price alert for a product
testCases.expectedOutcome: Complete buyer journey works seamlessly without errors

testCases.name: End-to-End Seller Journey
testCases.description: Complete seller user journey from login to RFQ response
testCases.expectedOutcome: Complete seller journey works seamlessly without errors

testCases.name: UI Design Consistency
testCases.description: Test UI design consistency across application
testCases.expectedOutcome: UI design is consistent across all pages following design system

testCases.name: Keyboard Navigation
testCases.description: Test keyboard-only navigation
steps: Navigate site using only Tab key
Test dropdown menus with arrow keys
testCases.expectedOutcome: All features accessible via keyboard navigation

testCases.name: Screen Reader Compatibility
testCases.description: Test screen reader compatibility
steps: Check ARIA labels on interactive elements
Test form field labels announced correctly
testCases.expectedOutcome: Screen readers can navigate and understand all content

smoke.name: Smoke Test Suite
smoke.description: Quick validation that core features work

executionNotes: Run smoke tests first to validate basic functionality
Execute critical path tests before each release
Full regression suite should run nightly or before major releases
Some tests require specific user types - refer to test_users.json
Tests marked 'critical' must pass for release approval
Use test data from database seed for consistent results
